label: AB2_oP24_61_c_2c-002
title: ClO$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
We use the data taken by (Rehr, 1992) at $-150 ^\circ$C. The the lattice constants in the CIF provided to the ICSD are slightly different than the ones in the published paper. We use the published values. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP24_61_c_2c-001}{AuSn$_{2}$} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP24_61_c_2c-002}{ClO$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB2\_oP24\_61\_c\_2c. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
